hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Mas’ud that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:“The Muslim has four things due from the Muslim: He should answer [by saying Yarhamuk-Allah (may Allah have mercy on you)] to him if he sneezes (and says Al-Hamdulillah); he should accept his invitation if he invites him; he should attend his funeral if he dies; and he should visit him if he falls sick.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي عِيَادَةِ الْمَرِيضِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning visiting the sick
